channel.title: Generalization on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Generalization on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 19, 2025
item.description: Covered Chapter 7 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on generalization. The material discusses the challenge of ensuring AI systems behave reliably when encountering new situations or data distributions different from their training environment.
